nodes.text: Giant Sarlacc of Ancient Ruins of Tatooine

This sarlacc was on Tatooine and was very large, larger than the Great Pit of Carkoon. Its tentacles could easily grab a nearby living creature, and was located next to the Ancient Tatooine Ruins. Dooku was Force pushed into the sarlacc, but was able to use the Force to get out before he got into its mouth.
